data.title: Ministry of investment
data.text:
Saudi Arabia is hoping to capitalize on investment from both China and Europe, Ibrahim Al Mubarak, Assistant Minister of Investment tells CNBC’s @themmagraham

Saudi Arabia is reforming its investment laws in a bid to attract capital. CNBC’s @themmagraham spoke to Saudi’s Assistant Minister of Investment in an exclusive interview about those reforms.

The rapidly changing global labor market requires a workforce equipped for the future. #Saudi_Vision_2030 aims to provide #Saudis with knowledge & skills to excel globally,boosting Human Capital&Innovation sector.

Find out about #Updated_Investment_Law at https://lnkd.in/dkRXMy7Y

As the proud host of the #ESportsWorldCup, #SaudiArabia has one of the largest gaming industries in the region. In 2023,our gaming industry generated over $1bn in revenue, representing18% of the MENA games sector.

Find out about #Updated_Investment_Law at http://investsaudi.sa/en/resources/updatedInvestmentLaw

Explore the booming potential of #SaudiArabia’s ICT sector which became the largest digital and technical market in MENA.

Find out about #Updated_Investment_Law at http://investsaudi.sa/en/resources/updatedInvestmentLaw

#SaudiArabia’s tourism sector is thriving, driven by #Saudi_Vision_2030. With attractions like #Diriyah and #AlUla, and expanding entertainment & cultural offerings.

Explore opportunities in this growing industry and #Updated_Investment_Law at http://investsaudi.sa/en/resources/updatedInvestmentLaw

Under #Saudi_Vision_2030, transport & logistics sector is thriving. The Kingdom sits at the crossroads of major trade routes linking Arabian Peninsula, the Levant,and East Africa, making it a global logistics hub.

Find out about #Updated_Investment_Law at http://investsaudi.sa/en/resources/updatedInvestmentLaw

With ambitious targets to establish more than 36k factories by 2035, including a strong push in automotive production for the manufacture of more than 410k vehicles by 2030, now is the time to invest in #SaudiArabia.

More about #Updated_Investment_Law at http://investsaudi.sa/en/resources/updatedInvestmentLaw

#SaudiArabia’s real estate sector is thriving under #Saudi_Vision_2030’s ambitious goals, aiming for 70% home ownership, advancing tech-driven development, and pioneering innovative financing solutions.

Explore the #Updated_Investment_Law at http://investsaudi.sa/en/resources/updatedInvestmentLaw

The rapidly changing global labor market requires a workforce equipped for the future.#Saudi_Vision_2030 aims to provide Saudis with knowledge & skills to excel globally, boosting Human Capital & Innovation sector.

With a young and growing population of ~33 million, the Kingdom offers unparalleled opportunities for innovation and investment.
